name: Spectrum (itch) (Mark Sheeky)
description:
A wall-blasting game for Amiga & Amiga emulators. This was my second Amiga game and was originally released in December 1991.

Spectrum is a variant on Breakout games, partly inspired by the boss levels on a C64 game called Eagle Empire. A wall at the top of screen gradually descends to crush the player. Use the joystick to move left and right and fire, Space Invaders style, to blast a hole in the wall before you are crushed.

Supplied in ADF format for use with Amiga emulators, and in RP9 format for use with Cloanto's Amiga Forever and other RetroPlatform emulators.
